Liz watched as Chris took a bite of his food and his smile faded as his face soured. “Would you mind?” Chris asked. With approval from Elizabeth Chris tried her grilled chicken and salad.

Liz was shocked, he looked downright angry. “Chris, what's wrong?” Elizabeth asked quietly.

Not answering he flagged down a waiter. Who in turn retrieved a manager. “This food is not just sub par but an insult.” Chris said.

“I'm sorry sir, what exactly is wrong with it?” The manager asked.

“Well my lamb is dry and chewy” he started anger creeping into his voice “the spicing is clumped in one spot instead of properly distributed, my salad is nothing but lettuce and dressing and this lovely lady's chicken is raw inside and her salad was made with clearly moldy feta cheese” Chris was yelling by the end.

After getting the chef fired, Chris stormed out and Elizabeth followed looking apologetically. “There's no nice restaurant we'll be able to get into this time of day.” Chris glumed.
